lines: 1. An ayie Ruoth Yesu koro,An ayiee gi chunya;Osewacho e wach maremondo nyithindo dhine.
Yesu `hera, Yesu `hera,Ee, ohera ang`eyo;Yesu notho mond` owara,E momiyo ahere.
2. Anadhi ka ma odwaro,Analu bang`e pile.Kat` an nyathi, ee anyalo,To Yesu otelona.
3. Entie pile mond` okonya,Kik Satani oloya;Ka abedo bute pile,Anyalo timo maber.
